pageContext.title: Enhancing Music Notation Addressability
pageContext.description_excerpt: EMA is a collaboration with the Du Chemin: Lost Voices project (Haverford College), which is reconstructing songs printed by Nicholas Du Chemin between 1549 and 1568 in Paris. We will work on music analyses already produced by students and scholars as part of the Du Chemin project and re-model them as Linked Open Data nanopublications.
pageContext.participants: Andrew Hankinson, Raffaele Viglianti, Richard Freedman
